long_description: With outer fabric handwoven in Guatemala using an indigenous Mayan method, the I AM. yoga mat bag carries the signature of the artisan and a QR code that connects you to her story. Innovative design fits 24 in. and 26 in. mats; it features an adjustable shoulder strap, around-the-corner zipper for packing ease and grommeted ventilation holes. The I AM. yoga mat bag features a full-length waterproof compartment to stow your post-savasana sweats and an external end pocket so you can reach essentials on the go. Started through a Kickstarter campaign, I AM. offers Mayan women a way to turn their woven works into income to support their families.
